remarks: Value of an operation given by a maps-to rule, deduction form. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ovmpt2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. C , y e. D |-> R ) ) $.
ovmpt2d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = A /\ y = B ) ) -> R = S ) $.
ovmpt2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. C ) $.
ovmpt2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. D ) $.
ovmpt2d.5 $e |- ( ph -> S e. X ) $.
ovmpt2d $p |- ( ph -> ( A F B ) = S ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
